description: Updates a thesaurus for an index.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the thesaurus you want to update.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for the thesaurus.

parameters.name: SourceS3Path
parameters.description: Information required to find a specific file in an Amazon S3 bucket. The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file. The name of the file.

nested_params.name: Bucket
nested_params.description: The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file.
